description: This Java source file defines a Spring configuration class 'WebCorsConfig' that sets up Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) policies for the backend API, specifically applying CORS settings to '/api/**' endpoints with configurable allowed origins.

classes.name: WebCorsConfig
classes.description: A Spring configuration class implementing WebMvcConfigurer to configure CORS settings for the REST API.

methods.name: addCorsMappings
methods.description: Overrides the method to apply CORS configurations to API endpoints, setting allowed origins, methods, headers, and other CORS policies.
